summary: Two different social classes get together at a family gathering in Mexico. Based on the TV project "Ruta 32".
cast: Andrés Almeida|Fernanda Castillo|Luz Cipriota|Dagoberto Gama|Gael García Bernal|Tenoch Huerta|Juan Pablo Medina|Jorge Luis Moreno|Pamela Reiter|Ana Serradilla|Camila Sodi|Giovanna Zacarías
title: Déficit
